name: Sorority Rites - Visual Novel
description:
PLEASE INSTALL OPENAL SOUND ENGINE OR ELSE YOU WILL ONLY HEAR MUSIC IN THE GAME AND NO SOUND EFFECTS (Jump effects, coin sounds, menu beeps, etc)
Sorority Rites is a free visual novel game that takes place 3 years before the events of ' The Last Yandere ' and the award-winning horror game ' Dere .Exe '. This light kinetic novel centers on new school transfer Myles, an 18-year old nobody, and her attempts to succeed at a deadly initiation ritual. She encounters Venice, the most popular girl on campus, and is forced to stay at a supposedly haunted mansion in order to pass the local sorority's initiation rites. However, things take a much darker turn.
Will Myles reject the sorority life? Does she escape the haunted mansion intact?
Download this spooky VN for free to find out!
